name: Lunar League
description:
This game is still in development. It was created as an entry for the 2020 Game Off.

Lunar League is a fast-paced space-based multiplayer battle game. Take on your enemies in this fun and interactive shooter that combines elements from the well-known battle royale and "io" type genres.

You control a spaceship and your objective is two-fold; protect your Moon and wipe out everyone else! Once you lose your Moon you won't be able to respawn anymore.

You can progress by collecting scraps scattered across the map. You gain levels by collecting these items. With each new level you can upgrade your ship - oh and your Moon also gains bonuses by the way!

Feedback and comments are more than welcome. Join our discord server if you want to take part in the development process!

https://discord.gg/GkwugCMqSC
